channel.title: Help logging in hello?
channel.description:
Ok I NEED HELP ASAP!!!!!!!!!! :confused:
IN THE MOPARSCAPE CLIENT.
FIRST WHAT I DO.
I PICK A SERVER THEN PUT IT ON MOPARSCAPE CLIENT AND THE PORT.
THE NEXT THING IT SAYS ERROR CONNECTING.
I CHECK THE WEBSITE IT SAYS ITS 100% UPTIME
THEN I CLICK START UR OWN SERVER THEN IT WORKS WTF?
=============================================================
OK TELL ME WHAT TO RUN FIRST?
JUST MOPARSCAPE AND PUT THE INFO IN?
RUN MOPARSCAPE AND HAMACHI THEN INFO?
RUN THE DOWNLOADED CLIENT, HAMACHI, THEN THE INFO?
I NEED HELP LOGGING IN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

item.title: Help logging in hello?
item.dc:creator: @john_paul_dw john paul dw
item.description:
@john_paul_dw wrote:

Okay, first off… some servers don’t need hamachi. Alright first, open moparscape client. Clicker “start server.”
Then hit “ok.” Then hit “enter.” Then… go up to the “file” drop down menu. Hit “new server” and put in the ip address of your server of choice. Then hit “ok.” Then go to the “file” drop down menu again and hit “new port.” Put in your port number of the ip, unless it’s default and hit “ok.” Then click “enter” and then put your username and password and click “log in.” This is like step by step instructions… if you can’t follow it… then yeah. Also, the server list isn’t always correct, sometime it’ll say the servers up time is 100% but it’s actually down for some reason.

-JP-

Read full topic
